DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure change Tear Osmolarity course day support clinical diagnosis aqueous deficiency meibomian gland disease differentiate two form dry eye .
DOC.detailed_description: The premise study dry eye disease , specifically tear osmolarity , change course day base etiology dry eye aqueous-deficiency dry eye worsen course day meibomian gland deficiency stabilize possibly even improve course day .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female ≥ 18 year old 2 . Negative urine pregnancy result females childbearing potential 3 . Able read sign inform consent form show willingness comply study protocol visit procedure 4 . Has 20/40 BCVA good least one eye 5 . Does currently wear contact lenses 6 . For AqueousDeficiency Group : Has symptom Dry Eye Schirmer test ≤ 10 mm Tear Break Up Time ≤ 8 second Conjunctival stain ≥ 1+ Meibomian gland inspissation ≤ 1+ No lid thickening , lid erythema , thicken , turbid meibomian gland secretion 7 . For Meibomian Gland Disease Group : Has symptom Dry Eye Schirmer test ≥ 10 mm Tear Break Up Time ≤ 8 second Conjunctival stain ≥ 1+ Meibomian gland inspissation ≥ 2+ 8 . For Normal Group : Has symptom Dry Eye Schirmer test > 10 mm Tear Break Up Time > 8 second No trace Conjunctival stain No Meibomian gland inspissation 1 . Any topical medication within last three month , except artificial tear 2 . Unable discontinue use artificial tear course day Visit 2 3 . Any Systemic disease , opinion Investigator , may affect ocular health confound study result 4 . Any active ocular disease Dry Eye Disease , Meibomian Gland Disease Sjogren 's Syndrome , opinion Investigator , may affect ocular health confound study result 5 . Clinically significant lid conjunctival abnormality , neovascularization , corneal scar corneal opacity 6 . Clinically significant limbal bulbar injection , corneal stain due DES 7 . Has wear hard rigid gas permeable contact lens within 1 year 8 . Has wear soft contact lens within 1 week 9 . Has eye surgery eye injury within 6 month 10 . Positive urine pregnancy result females childbearing potential 11 . Any change current medication within 30 day Visit 2 anticipated change course study , opinion Investigator may confound study result
